T02D3562:194a-1: mukte ke na t'a rodbha ba ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02D3562:194a-3: sgrol ma'i rtog pa las byung ba'i tshig lhug pa'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3562:194a-4: 'phags ma rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3562:194a-5: gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3562:194a-6: lha dang lha min mir bcas rnams //
T02D3562:194a-7: nges par mngag gzhug byed 'gyur ba'i //
T02D3562:194a-8: sgrol ma de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3562:194a-9: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i
T02D3562:194a-10: gnas su bud med kyi tshogs la sogs pa dang
T02D3562:194a-11: bral bar stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3562:194a-12: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su
T02D3562:194a-13: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3562:194a-14: 'od zer dang bcas pa'i hr'i:yig gi sa bon las
T02D3562:194a-15: byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis 'gro ba
T02D3562:194a-16: rnams gsal bar mdzad pa sngon du 'gro bas ku
T02D3562:194a-17: ru kulle'i ri la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D3562:194a-18: rigs byad ma yang dag par bskul nas spyan drangs
T02D3562:194a-19: shing mdun gyi nam mkha' la yang dag par bsams
T02D3562:194a-20: te / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las
T02D3562:194a-21: sprul pa'i me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa
T02D3562:194b-0: sna tshogs pa'i @194b mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D3562:194b-1: de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3562:194b-3: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3562:194b-5: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3562:194b-6: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3562:194b-7: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3562:194b-8: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3562:194b-9: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3562:194b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3562:194b-11: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3562:194b-12: de nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3562:194b-13: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
T02D3562:194b-14: sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3562:194b-15: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3562:194b-16: de'i rjes la 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba mtha' dag la snying rje bas /
T02D3562:194b-17: rang gi sems kyi sa bon gyi gzugs la blta ste /
T02D3562:194b-18: de yongs su gyur pa la autpa la dmar po'i
T02D3562:194b-19: steng na dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa
T02D3562:194b-20: las zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3562:194b-21: zer rnams kyis sngon bzhin du 'gro ba rnams gsal
T02D3562:194b-22: bar mdzad nas / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
T02D3562:194b-23: mtha' yas pa yang dag par bskul zhing spyan drangs
T02D3562:194b-24: nas mdun du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3562:194b-25: de nas autpa la la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog dmar mo /
T02D3562:194b-26: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3562:194b-27: dar dmar po'i stod g-yogs byas pas 'od zer dmar po dang ldan pa /
T02D3562:194b-28: rin po che dmar po'i rna rgyan can /
T02D3562:194b-30: g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa /
T02D3562:194b-31: gnyis pas mda' yang dag par 'gengs pa /
T02D3562:194b-32: g-yon na rin po che'i gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D3562:194b-33: gnyis pas autpal dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3562:194b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3562:194b-35: ku ru kulle'i ri'i phug na bzhugs pa /
T02D3562:194b-36: sgra gcan zin gyi mgo la gnas pa'i 'dod lha chung ma dang bcas pa'i steng du bzhugs pa /
T02D3562:194b-37: sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rol zhing dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan pa'i rigs byed ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3562:194b-38: de ltar na dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas skad
T02D3562:194b-39: cig gis ye shes sems dpa' mdun du spyan drangs
T02D3562:194b-40: te yang dag par mchod nas dam tshig gi phyag
T02D3562:195a-0: rgyas zhal gyi nang nas nang du @195a * //
T02D3562:195a-2: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D3562:195a-3: thal mo yang dag par sbyar nas gung mo dag
T02D3562:195a-4: rtse mor byas pa'i dbus su ming med dag bcug
T02D3562:195a-5: ste / gung mo'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis gnas
T02D3562:195a-6: shing mtheb chen gnyis 'og tu gzhug pa de lta
T02D3562:195a-7: bu'i rnam pa ni autpa la'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3562:195a-9: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D3562:195a-10: ji ltar mchod chen stsal ba ltar //
T02D3562:195a-11: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D3562:195a-12: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D3562:195a-14: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D3562:195a-15: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D3562:195a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D3562:195a-17: gnas las byung ba bdag gis sbyin //
T02D3562:195a-18: zhes brjod pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bkas spyan
T02D3562:195a-19: ma la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ster
T02D3562:195a-20: bar bsam par bya zhing 'od dpag med dbu rgyan
T02D3562:195a-21: du bzhugs pa'o // de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D3562:195a-22: ha cang skyen min bul ba'ang min //
T02D3562:195a-23: mi gsal ma yin cha mnyam min //
T02D3562:195a-24: yang dag ma yin rtog pa spangs /
T02D3562:195a-25: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3562:195a-26: de ltar thun mtshams gsum gyi rim pas khur ba
T02D3562:195a-27: dang ka ra la sogs pa'i gtor ma dbul ba
T02D3562:195a-28: sngon du 'gro bas rtag tu rgyun ma chad par
T02D3562:195a-29: brtan par 'jug pas zla ba drug tu bsgom par
T02D3562:195a-30: bya'o // grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-31: de'i rjes la zla ba dang po la nad la
T02D3562:195a-32: sogs pa bar du gcod pa brgya 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D3562:195a-33: ro // zla ba gnyis pa la ston mo gya nom pa ma bslangs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-34: gsum pa la gos sna tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-35: bzhi pa la sna tshogs pa'i so rtsi rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-36: lnga pa la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la
T02D3562:195a-37: sogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i bud med rnams
T02D3562:195a-39: zla ba drug pa la lha dang klu dang /
T02D3562:195a-42: mi'am ci la sogs pa'i bud med yid du 'ong ba dang phrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-43: bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms na phal cher bud med rnams kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195a-44: de la bdud kyi las 'di rnams spangs te /
T02D3562:195b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma sgom par @195b byed pa la rmi lam mam dngos su ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195b-8: sa 'og gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3562:195b-9: gal te so sor bkas ston par ma gyur na /
T02D3562:195b-10: de'i tshe sngar gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod pa dang /
T02D3562:195b-11: gtor ma dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas zla ba
T02D3562:195b-12: drug gi mthar zla ba yongs su gang ba'i mtshan
T02D3562:195b-13: mo ril por bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3562:195b-14: de nas phyag rgya 'bar te 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195b-15: phyag rgya des tshangs pa dang /
T02D3562:195b-19: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa yang dag par bkug ste /
T02D3562:195b-20: yang dag par 'ongs nas mngon par 'dod pa rnams rdzogs par sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3562:195b-21: de nas bzung ste skye ba dang /
T02D3562:195b-23: 'chi ba dang bral zhing grub pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D3562:195b-24: khams rnams su song nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D3562:195b-25: blta zhing sa dang gzungs la sogs pa rnams thob
T02D3562:195b-26: par 'gyur ro // sgrol ma'i rtog pa las byung
T02D3562:195b-27: ba'i tshig lhug pa'i ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs slob
T02D3562:195b-28: dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
